name: Samurai Siege
summary: Samurai Siege is a fun multiplayer combat strategy game. Defend your village against hordes of enemy ninjas, samurai, and creatures! Explore a mystical world as you battle through lush forests, snowy mountains, and deserts. Fight other players from around the world to capture loot and steal rare items. Or join forces with other players to create the most powerful Alliance! Wage war with other alliances and compete to dominate the realm.
